title: A Pastor Comments on Jordan Peterson's Bible Series Prolegomena of Prolegomena
description:
Jordan Peterson Biblical Series 1: Introduction to the Idea of God https://youtu.be/f-wWBGo6a2w 

Paul Vander Klay's main blog http://leadingchurch.com 

Living Stones CRC YouTube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A 

Neil Postman's Amusing Ourselves To Death https://www.amazon.com/Amusing-Ourselves-Death-Discourse-Business-ebook/dp/B0023ZLLH6
